local edition_poll = pseudorandom(pseudoseed('illusion'))
local edition = {}
if edition_poll > 1 - 0.15 then edition.polychrome = true
elseif edition_poll > 0.5 then edition.holo = true
else edition.foil = true
end
card:set_edition(edition)
